Hello, welcome to the bot! üòä

How can the bot help you?
This bot is designed to check your child's mental activity. If you enter your child's first name, last name, and date of birth, the bot will provide IQ tests suitable for your child's age.

‚ùó Reminder: Our bot is intended only for children between 3 and 7 years old.
